title: Theodora Porphyrogenita
summary: Theodora Porphyrogenita[lower-alpha 1] (Greek: Θεοδώρα Πορφυρογενίτη, Theodōra Porphyrogenítē; c. 980 – 31 August 1056) was Byzantine Empress from 21 April 1042 to her death on 31 August 1056, and sole ruler from 11 January 1055. She was born into the Macedonian dynasty that ruled the Byzantine Empire for almost 200 years.
